author: datvm
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

Right now in Windows 11 File Explorer you have to click `Show More Option` or Shift + F10 to have access to PowerShell 7 menu (for Open here command):

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6388546/130018459-f9b7dcbc-7f87-4b0a-81c7-3849fecfc956.png)

Please add option to have it on the common menu.

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

I am not sure if this is helpful the way PowerShell 7 is implemented: https://blogs.windows.com/blog/2021/07/19/extending-the-context-menu-and-share-dialog-in-windows-11/
